abstract: Leonard Cohen, the celebrated songwriter, dropped the news that he will release his first album since 2004 sometime next year. The album, to be called "Old Ideas," has been recorded and will contain 10 new songs.
snippet: Leonard Cohen, the celebrated songwriter, dropped the news that he will release his first album since 2004 sometime next year. The album, to be called "Old Ideas," has been recorded and will contain 10 new songs.
lead_paragraph: Leonard Cohen, the celebrated songwriter, dropped the news that he will release his first album since 2004 sometime next year, Reuters reported. Mr. Cohen, in Spain to receive a literary award, said the album has already been recorded and contains 10 unreleased songs. It will be called "Old Ideas."

headline.main: Leonard Cohen to Release a New Album Next Year
